value.creator: a7NqWcrGGr54kCacwqjQYw
value.description:
@Cl√©mentWebdrone - please reword this ticket
I don't think it's a Detail crawl but  Batch + Detail crawl
The Connector will have to call thefollowing methods :
fr.webdrone.connectors.orchestrator.tasks.SearchQueryTask.updateStatsAfterBatch    updateStatsFromDocumentItemExecution updateStatsFromDocumentItemTheoreticExecution   setCurrentNbRemainingItemToExecute  addChildTaskOrGet setFinished

This process has to handle the first batch too

customField.stringValue:
The BatchNode is where a batch is initialized. It initializes objects where information about how to restart query, the number of remaining results, etc, are stored.

When the batch node is initialized, a timer is started and a new task is created (SearchQueryTask.addChildTaskOrGet). The following variables are injected into the context : 
- cn.search.nbRemainingItemsToCrawl : the number of remaining items to crawl for the search (SearchQueryTask.nbRemainingItemsToCrawl)
- cn.search.isFinished : whether the task is finished (will call SearchQueryTask.setFinished) when set to true
- cn.search.restartInfos : map containing information on how to restart the query from where it has been stopped

If an error occurs during the batch node, we will save informations about the error and stop the connector execution

When all the children of the batch node are executed, we save the stats (SearchQueryTask.updateStatsAfterBatch)

The goal is to 
- collect all costs when performing the searchs
- priorize queries (start/stop when necessary)
- add option in KB-Studio to identify url of documents, failures, params needed to restart the search

Tasks related to persistence of connector's state and restart have been postponed to next milestone
